Agreed, particularly in combination with the Adapter pattern David 
suggested! By refactoring a bunch of associated attributes into a single 
DriverResponse, the multiple assertions in one of my test cases have 
become a single Assert#assertDrverResponseDone(DriverResponse). :)
--
Stephen Smith, MEng (Wales).
http://www.stephen-smith.co.uk/

Chris Dollin wrote:
> WRT multiple assertions per test:
> 
> Sometimes (I have found) the multiple assertions are part of one
> conceptual assertion, and I write a new assertWossname method.
>
subject: Re: [junit] Multiple assertions per test
